name: Sharpshooter (itch) (Maaz)
description:
So I was making the same game in 5, 50 and 500 minutes for a YouTube video and I decided to upload the 500 minute version to itch, so here we are.

Your gun will point at your mouse and you need to click to shoot, you will get knocked back, press R to reset. Make it to the end as fast as possible.
